title: Sunken City Adventure #1
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Diving Bell Chamber
rooms.description: You stand inside a rusty diving bell that has come to rest on the ocean floor. Through the porthole, you see the ruins of an ancient city covered in coral and seaweed. Bioluminescent fish cast an eerie glow. A heavy metal door leads deeper into the ruins.

items.name: waterproof supply crate
items.description: A sealed crate with diving equipment and supplies

items.name: sharp diving knife
items.description: A sturdy knife useful for cutting through obstacles

items.name: equipment locker
items.description: A metal locker with two compartments, partially corroded by seawater

items.name: expedition logbook
items.description: A waterlogged journal from a previous explorer
items.text: Day 15: We've discovered the lost city of Atlantea! According to the inscriptions, it was founded in the year 1247. The city was ruled by King Nereus. The temple holds the legendary Pearl of Tides. We must find the three sacred artifacts to enter.

items.name: corroded bronze key
items.description: An ancient bronze key covered in barnacles

items.name: sealed metal hatch
items.description: A heavy hatch leading into the sunken city ruins. Seaweed has grown over the lock mechanism.

rooms.name: Sunken Plaza
rooms.description: A vast underwater plaza with crumbling stone buildings and statues covered in coral. Ancient pillars rise toward the surface. In the center stands a large fountain with three statue figures. Schools of colorful fish dart between the ruins. A massive temple entrance looms to the north.

items.name: statue of a warrior
items.description: A weathered statue holding a trident, part of the central fountain
items.text: Inscription at base: 'Guardian of the Deep - The warrior protects the city with strength and courage.'

items.name: statue of a scholar
items.description: A statue holding a scroll, covered in green algae
items.text: Inscription at base: 'Keeper of Knowledge - The scholar preserves wisdom in the Great Library beneath the waves.'

items.name: statue of King Nereus
items.description: A regal statue wearing a crown, the centerpiece of the fountain
items.text: Inscription at base: 'King Nereus - Founder and eternal ruler of Atlantea. His crown rests in the royal vault.'

items.name: barnacle-covered stone chest
items.description: An ornate chest sealed with a bronze lock

items.name: golden trident
items.description: A ceremonial trident made of gold, one of the sacred artifacts

items.name: preserved ancient scroll
items.description: A miraculously preserved scroll sealed in waterproof material
items.text: Sacred Scroll of Atlantea: To enter the Temple of Tides, one must answer the three questions of the ancients. Know the founder's name, the location of wisdom, and the resting place of the crown.

items.name: large coral formation
items.description: A massive coral structure growing around something metallic

items.name: tarnished silver crown
items.description: An ancient crown, another sacred artifact of the city

items.name: temple entrance
items.description: Massive stone doors carved with ancient symbols. Three questions are etched into a stone tablet beside the entrance.

password_questions.question: Who founded this city?
password_questions.hint: Check the expedition log and the statues in the plaza

password_questions.question: Where is wisdom preserved?
password_questions.hint: Read the inscription on the scholar's statue

password_questions.question: Where does the crown rest?
password_questions.hint: The inscription on King Nereus's statue mentions this

rooms.name: Temple of Tides
rooms.description: You have entered the sacred Temple of Tides! The interior glows with an otherworldly blue light. In the center, on a pedestal of pure crystal, rests the legendary Pearl of Tides - a massive pearl that pulses with magical energy. Ancient murals depicting the glory of Atlantea cover the walls. A shaft of light from above shows the way to the surface.

items.name: Pearl of Tides
items.description: A magnificent pearl the size of a human head, glowing with inner light and radiating ancient power

items.name: crystal pedestal
items.description: A pedestal made of flawless crystal, holding the legendary pearl

items.name: temple murals
items.description: Beautiful paintings showing the rise and fall of the sunken city
items.text: The murals tell the story of Atlantea: a prosperous city that sank beneath the waves in a single night. The Pearl of Tides was said to grant its bearer safe passage through any waters.

rooms.win_message: You have discovered the legendary Pearl of Tides! As you grasp the ancient artifact, it glows brightly and creates a bubble of air around you. The pearl's magic guides you safely to the surface, and you emerge victorious with the treasure of the sunken city. You win!
